entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
